marklogic.body: Different Era, I know, but Frank Selke didn't speak French. Though a Montrealer, I don't believe Sam Pollock spoke French. They more than anyone are responsible for the Montreal winning tradition. Winning covers a multitude of unilingual sins! Hire the best GM, whatever the language, go all out to get a French coach, and get on with rebuilding. (Would Serge want another kick at the can, or does he really need the Headaches?)
